mbio.ncct.ont.view

Class AdvancedReadsFilterController

  • java.lang.Object
    • mbio.ncct.ont.view.AdvancedReadsFilterController

  • public class AdvancedReadsFilterController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the controller of the advanced reads-filter settings.
    Author:
    Yan Zhou created on 2019/05/14
